def main():
    r1, s = map(int, input().split())
    print(s*2-r1)

main()

import sys

R1, S = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split(' '))

R2 = 2*S - R1

print(R2)

#-----main-----
r1, s = map(int, input().split())
r2 = 2*s - r1
print(r2)

R1, S = map(int, input().split())

R2 = 2 * S - R1

print(R2)

r1, s = [int(n) for n in input().split()]
r2 = 2*s - r1
print(r2)
